## Welcome to openwashdata

We will launch in March 2023 and are currently hiring a [Scientific Assistant in Data Science](https://jobs.ethz.ch/job/view/JOPG_ethz_6PFAFZNUVkFUIsDVAw ).

Stay up to date by subscribing to [openwashdata news](https://buttondown.email/openwashdata), a newsletter delivered as an email to your inbox.

Or check out [the proposal](pages/proposal/index.html) that was funded for this project.
